is_symptomatic.text: HR < 60/min AND Symptomatic? (Hypotension, AMS, chest pain, CHF, seizures, syncope, shock)

respiratory_distress_if_indicated.text: Respiratory Distress Protocol AR 4 if indicated

chest_pain_if_indicated.text: Chest Pain: Cardiac & STEMI Protocol AC 4 if indicated

fluid_bolus.text: Normal Saline 500 mL – 2 L IV/IO (unless acute CHF), max 2 L

atropine.text: Atropine 1 mg IV/IO; repeat q3–5 min, max total 3 mg

pressors.text: If no improvement after Atropine → Vasopressor infusion
yesActions: Epinephrine 1–10 mcg/min IV/IO titrate to SBP ≥ 90 mmHg
OR Dopamine 2–20 mcg/kg/min IV/IO titrate to SBP ≥ 90 mmHg

pacing_consideration.text: If no improvement → Start Transcutaneous Pacing (TCP)
pacing_consideration.note: Consider earlier in 2nd or 3rd degree AV block

consider_sedation.text: Midazolam 2–2.5 mg IV/IO/IM/IN, max 10 mg (for pacing sedation)

suspected_beta_blocker_ccb.condition: If suspected Beta-Blocker or Calcium Channel Blocker overdose
suspected_beta_blocker_ccb.action: Follow Overdose / Toxic Ingestion Protocol TE 7

notify_med_control.text: Notify destination or Contact Medical Control
